entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is watching the practical examination from near the doors into the entrance hall.

entities.name: tofty
entities.description: Professor Tofty is examining Harry again and praises his boggart banishing spell.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry demonstrates a perfect boggart banishing spell in front of Professor Tofty and Umbridge.

entities.name: tiberius ogden
entities.description: Tiberius Ogden is mentioned as Harry's friend who claims that Harry can produce a Patronus.

relationships.description: Harry imagines Umbridge being sacked and casts the Expecto Patronum spell to conjure a Patronus that targets her.
Professor Tofty is examining Harry again and praises his boggart banishing spell.
